text: Procerapachys is an extinct genus of ants which existed 37 to 42 million years ago. A member of the subfamily Dorylinae of the family Formicidae, Procerapachys was first described by American entomologist William Morton Wheeler in 1915. ==References== Category:Dorylinae Category:Fossil ant genera Category:Eocene insects Category:Fossil taxa described in 1915 Category:Fossil taxa described in 2009 † Category:Eocene genus first appearances Category:Fossil insects of Europe
title: Procerapachys
